intro: Psychotria iodotricha, commonly known as the iodotricha psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, often found in the undergrowth of tropical rainforests. Psychotria iodotricha is also noted for its potential ethnobotanical significance in traditional medicine.
